cast.overview: Ash, a handsome, shotgun-toting, chainsaw-armed department store clerk, is time warped backwards into England's Dark Ages, where he romances a beauty and faces legions of the undead.
cast.title: Army of Darkness

details.biography: Don Campbell was born on April 6, 1957 in Detroit, Michigan, USA. He is an actor and director, known for Army of Darkness (1992), The Evil Dead (1981) and Young at Hearts (1994). He is actor Bruce Campbell's brother. Unlike his brother, Don had no serious interest to become an actor and joined the United States Army Reserves in 1980, and stayed with the army for 32 years.
details.name: Don Campbell
